Title: My Town, It's On Fire Again
Description:
I don't know if you noticed, but my town is on fire... again.

We have water buckets all over town, but no one can get out to put out the fires. Please, please, help us!
ObjectivesText: Use Mistfall Water Buckets to douse 60 fires.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Mayor Shiyo at Mistfall Village in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
